name: Human
description: Humans are the most adaptable, ambitious, and diverse people among the common races. Their tastes, morals, and customs are wide-ranging, and they are innovators, achievers, and pioneers of the world. While other races are often defined by a singular trait, humans are defined by their boundless potential and their drive to make their mark on a world they will only inhabit for a short time.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your ability scores each increase by 1.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Extra Language
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choice.
